description:
As stated above, I installed it primarily for seperating pages from a PDF without having to use some obscure webpage. 
Works great for that.
summary: Great for separating single pages from a larger PDF

description:
Perhaps there is a better app for fill-in pdf forms, but there's only so much time to search for one when you need one.

I was able to use this successfully to work on some fill-in forms just fine.

Ease of use issues:

Other reviewers complained they couldn’t find the app after install, but the app shows up in my applications. Perhaps the other reviewers want it to pin itself on the app tray but I prefer to add them there only if I want them.

Opening new files or using “save as” is a bit confusing as first because the app uses a separate window that doesn’t pop-up to the front of the screen. I had to minimize the app’s window to access the open-file window. That’s not great but not a deal breaker.

I haven't figured out how to print using the app yet but that might be a permission thing.
summary: Does the job; Integration with Ubuntu could be better

description: After installation, the app could not be found on the system or used
As per previous two reviews, no sign of the app on the system after installation.
Just as Leon said. After installing Master PDF Editor, I could not find it in my Ubuntu system.

I'd love to provide a review for this application, but I can't find it after installing it. How do I run it? I need to edit a PDF and LibreOffice is completely useless for this because their user interface doesn't work (e.g., it's not possible to add a simple checkbox, radio button, or text field in a document even when Form Design Mode is on according to the Form Mode Toolbar), so I was hoping a specialized application would work.

At this point my review of Master PDF Editor 5 is: It's VapourWare (it doesn't actually exist)
summary: Does this application actually do anything? I can't find it!

description: After searching 'Master' in 'Mate Search Tool' gave me ', i found executable 'master-pdf-editor-5.masterpdfeditor5' in the /snap/bin/ directory. Started form terminal : OK, works.
There was no information about that this software is non-free.
summary: You have to pay for this software!

description:
The application is not free, which is fine if it is clearly advertised as such in the description. The description doesn't say anything about the payments.
It is a bait-and-switch marketing, which is simply disrespectful.
summary: The app wants you to pay in order to save files without watermarks

description: installation does not work.
Good program, but has no quick start icon. As stated by another reviewer, the snap file is stored in 'snap/bin' directory and needs to be started from the Terminal.
summary: Good program, but likes to hide

description: it works wellforfreeversion but to workproperly in ubuntu 22.04 downloadstraight from website and install it and icon will appear andwork

installed snap on kubuntu 22.04 with backports but launch button in discover does not work, nor is the app listed in the applications menu.

if it seems too good to be true, it probably is.

Dokument öffnen, Dokument schließen - Absturz
Tastenkombinationen funktionieren nur teilweise.
habs gleich wieder deinstalliert.

Lo he instalado sin problemas en ubuntu 22.04. Lo puedo levantar desde la super tecla, cambié idioma en preferencias y, incluso, he podido editar texto, con la salvedad que quedará registrada una marca de agua, lo que es soportable, si no he pagado por la versión licenciada. Aún debo probar más sus funcionalidades, pero me parece más "responsivo" que libreoffice draw.

No aparece en el listado de aplicaciones.
lo instale y no aparace al buscarlo por el nombre o buscarlo en las aplicaciones instaladas
Lo descargue y desisntale dos veces por que pense que era un error pero no. No aparece una vez descargado, no como programa ni extension ni como opcion para un pdf
No me permite iniciar la aplicación. No se lista en las aplicaciones, ni siquiera como opción para abrir un archivo.
et filigrane lors de l'enregistrement
Прога отличная, эффективно решает проблему отображения во время печати кириллического текста.
